sentences.en: Convertible top opens and closes very slowly. Hydraulic unit makes noises.
sentences.cn: 顶蓬开关很慢, 液压单元有噪音.

sentences.en: Falsehood is false, and truth is true, although they are convertible.
sentences.cn: 虚假是假的, 真相是真的, 尽管能改变.

sentences.en: Her own car is a convertible Golf.
sentences.cn: 她自己有一辆敞篷高尔夫。

sentences.en: Only the United States dollar was convertible into gold, at the price of $ 35 an ounce.
sentences.cn: 只有美元可以按35美元换一盎司黄金的价格来兑换成黄金.

sentences.en: POD is a flexible structure made of convertible elements.
sentences.cn: 酶是一种灵活的结构转换的内容.

sentences.en: Potential energy is convertible to kinetic energy.
Professionals always focus on the way of pricing of convertible bonds.
sentences.cn: 可转债的定价方法一直是国内外业内人士关注的重点.

sentences.en: Stock is convertible into cash or other negotiable securities.
sentences.cn: 股票可换成现金或其他有价证券.

sentences.en: That new white convertible is totally awesome.
sentences.cn: 那辆新的白色折篷汽车简直棒极了.

sentences.en: The convertible sofa means that the apartment can sleep four.
sentences.cn: 有了这张折叠沙发,公寓里可以睡下4个人.

sentences.en: The transferable preference shares refer to those convertible into ordinary shares.
sentences.cn: 可调换优先股指可换成普通股的优先股.

sentences.en: They don't have access to a convertible currency.
sentences.cn: 他们无法得到可兑换货币.

sentences.en: What really killed the convertible was air conditioning and stereo.
sentences.cn: 真正把敞篷汽车赶上绝路的是空气调节器和立体声收音机.

sentences.en: Yano's whole money supply is convertible into gold.
sentences.cn: 雅努国的所有纸币都是可以换成黄金的.

sentences.en: You can hire a small convertible for $ 100 a day.
sentences.cn: 你可以以100美元一天的价格租一辆敞篷车.

皈依者；改变宗教信仰者
[电] 变流器，整流器；转化器
可变换，可兑换；可改变性

转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰
使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰

自由兑换货币；可兑换货币；可兑换通货
可转换证券；可兑换证券

trans.tran_en: an object that is convertible can be folded or arranged in a different way so that it can be used as something else
a car with a soft roof that you can fold back or remove
